mapper.sql: PAYMENT_METHOD_ID, FEE_TYPE_ID, CUSTOMER_TYPE_ID, PAYMENT_METHOD_CODE, PAYMENT_METHOD_NAME, PAYMENT_URL, INSTALLMENT_CONFLICT_FLAG, STATE, CREATE_OP_ID, CREATE_ORG_ID, OP_ID, ORG_ID, DONE_CODE, CREATE_DATE, DONE_DATE, EFFECTIVE_DATE, EXPIRE_DATE, TENANT_ID, REMARKS, SUBSSYS_CODE
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from payment_method
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into payment_method (PAYMENT_METHOD_ID, FEE_TYPE_ID, CUSTOMER_TYPE_ID, PAYMENT_METHOD_CODE, PAYMENT_METHOD_NAME, PAYMENT_URL, INSTALLMENT_CONFLICT_FLAG, STATE, CREATE_OP_ID, CREATE_ORG_ID, OP_ID, ORG_ID, DONE_CODE, CREATE_DATE, DONE_DATE, EFFECTIVE_DATE, EXPIRE_DATE, TENANT_ID, REMARKS, SUBSSYS_CODE) values (#{paymentMethodId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{feeTypeId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{customerTypeId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{paymentMethodCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paymentMethodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paymentUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{installmentConflictFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createOpId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createOrgId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{opId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{orgId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{doneCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{doneDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{effectiveDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{expireDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{tenantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subssysCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
